room_title: Escape room "Dr. Stein's Laboratory" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
room_description: This room is mad scientist-themed with puzzles focused around science, simple machines, and special devices. After discovering who Dr. Stein really is, you will follow his footsteps and discover the secret project he is working on. It is up to you and your fellow scientists to follow the clues left behind and escape the laboratory!
